attributes.action: Create a law that states that all home appliances must either automatically shutdown when not in use, or operate in stand-by mode only via battery power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to conserve energy and make home appliances more efficient, a law should be enacted to demand a minimum level of efficiency :- TV, Videos etc. should have rechargable batteries to run the stand-by function instead of running constanlty off the mains, Washing Machines, Dishwashers, should auto shut down after the cycle has finished.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
